info.author: Shoji KUMAGAI
info.description:
=========================
 sphinxcontrib.marmaidjs
=========================

Sphinx extenstion to generate diagrams and flowcharts via Mermaid.js.

Feature
=======

* provide ``mermaidjs`` directives to generate diagrams and flowcharts for reStructuredText

Installation
============

Install via pip::

  $ pip install sphinxcontrib.mermaidjs


setup conf.py with::

  extensions = ['sphinxcontrib.mermaidjs', ]

This package is NOT includes Mermaid.js and Mermaid.css themselves.
So, you need to add `setup` function into conf.py, as below.

.. code:: python

   def setup(app):
       app.add_javascript('path/to/mermaid.min.js')
       app.add_javascript('path/to/mermaid.min.css')

And then::

  $ make html

License
=======

Licensed under the `Apache Software License <http://opensource.org/licenses/Apache-2.0>`_ .
See the LICENSE file for specific terms.


Authors
=======

Sphinx directive and packaging
------------------------------
* Shoji Kumagai <take.this.2.your.grave@gmail.com> Sphinx-users.jp

Changes
=======

0.1.0 (28 Jul, 2017)
--------------------
* first release

info.html_description:
Sphinx extenstion to generate diagrams and flowcharts via Mermaid.js.

Feature

  • provide mermaidjs directives to generate diagrams and flowcharts for reStructuredText

Installation

Install via pip:

$ pip install sphinxcontrib.mermaidjs

setup conf.py with:

extensions = ['sphinxcontrib.mermaidjs', ]

This package is NOT includes Mermaid.js and Mermaid.css themselves. So, you need to add setup function into conf.py, as below.

def setup(app):
    app.add_javascript('path/to/mermaid.min.js')
    app.add_javascript('path/to/mermaid.min.css')

And then:

$ make html
